description: To address CVE-2023-36393, Microsoft has released several updates to the Windows operating system. These include KB5032199, KB5032192, KB5032190, and KB5032189, which apply to various Windows 10 and Windows 11 builds. These updates are essential for patching the remote code execution vulnerabilities identified. Administrators should ensure their systems are upgraded to the following build numbers: 10.0.22631.2715, 10.0.19045.3693, and others listed in the post. Relevant update package links include KB5032199 (https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032199), KB5032190 (https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032190), and KB5032189 (https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032189).
